messages.title: The Tories don’t care about the NHS or the North East
messages.content: I remember the 80’s when the Tories trashed our region by closing industries, destroying jobs, wrecking families and whole communities. They left a scar across the North East that has not yet truly healed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The NHS is there for all of us, it's there when we're born and it cares for us throughout our lives.

issues.health: The NHS is there for all of us, it's there when we're born and it cares for us throughout our lives.
issues.labourEmployment: I used to be a miner and I remember the pain the Tories caused when the mines closed.

community.content: I used to be a miner and I remember the pain the Tories caused when the mines closed.

quotes.text: The Tories don’t care about the NHS or the North East. On June 8th, vote for a strong local Labour MP.

images.caption: Our children were born on the NHS and it cared for my wife when she was ill.

examples: I remember the 80’s when the Tories trashed our region by closing industries, destroying jobs, wrecking families and whole communities. They left a scar across the North East that has not yet truly healed.
